body:
Comment 6 by **mstplbrg**: 
Well, as I said, we are building natively. However, we also provide additional packages
that you can install to build for the non-native architecture.

E.g. on linux/amd64, youâ€™ll get a cgo-enabled compiler built for linux/amd64. You can
optionally install golang-go-windows-386 which contains a cross-compiled windows/386
stdlib, so you can easily cross-compile if you desire to do so.
